Rio_Rancho.Cottonwood Mall (Albuquerque, New Mexico: Cottonwood Mall is a shopping mall located in Albuquerque, New Mexico, United States. The mall is anchored by Dillard's, JCPenney and Sears (formerly Montgomery Ward). The mall is the second largest mall in the state of New Mexico (after Coronado Center) with a gross leasable area of 1,041,680 square feet (96,775 m2).; it features over 130 stores, as well as a food court and Regal Cinemas (formerly United Artists) Theater.
